responsibilities: Understanding the product and deploying and provisioning the application in different Operating systems in IBM cloud by creating virtual machines.
Functional Testing: Verify that LSF is performing tasks such as job scheduling, load balancing, resource management, and fault tolerance according to the specified requirements.
Integration Testing: Ensure LSF integrates smoothly with other components or products in the IBM ecosystem (like IBM Spectrum LSF or any related workload management tools).
Performance Testing: Test LSF’s ability to handle large-scale jobs, multiple nodes, and resource- heavy tasks.
worked on Testing different IBM cloud services on Billing domain for several countries.

Handling new CRs (Change Requests) which includes DTP (Detail Test Plan) creation, test execution, tasks assigning and TER (Test Exit Report).
Static checks by running DB queries.
Functional & Regression test suits running using Automation scripts which are developed using RIT (Rational Integration Testing).
Backend services-MQs and IIB, MBAs checking from PUTTY and through REST gate way.
Verification of all test results and providing review comments.
Collaborating with SMEs and Dev leads for clarifications.
Handling POS Journey (Point of sale testing) calls with End-to-End Teams and clients.
Tracking test execution and defect status in RQM (Rational Quality Manager).
Grooming new joiners in the team by giving KTs and guiding them.
Test Execution of manual scripts.
Preparation and execution of test cases as per requirements.
Played a key role in System testing, Regression testing and system integration testing.
Mapping the functional requirements with test cases.
Web service testing using POSTMAN, SoapUI, PUTTY.
Development of test Scenarios, Test Cases, traceability, executing Test Cases and verifying the actual results against the expected results.
Extensively worked on proof of concepts.
Writing the Test Scripts using data driven framework.
Executing regression test cases for every new build.
Performed functional, integration, sanity, regression testing.

Comparing the response with the DB and Database validation from SQL queries.
